text: A chop block may refer to: * Chop block (gridiron football), a play in which one or more players of the same team are in contact with an opposing team's player, one of whom is blocking at or below the knees. * Chop block (professional wrestling attack), a professional wrestling attack which similarly targets an opponent's knee. ==See also== * Chopping block * Chopping Block * The Chopping Block
title: Chop block
